Name: Bear Trap
FlavorText: Classic teeth and spring design.

Name: Acid Mine
FlavorText: Corrodes metal and flesh alike.

Name: Neural Snare
FlavorText: Electromagnetic pulse that shuts down nerves.

Name: Dirty Bandage
FlavorText: Stops minor bleeding, but carries infection risk.

Name: Suture Kit
FlavorText: Needles and silk for deep wounds.

Name: Trauma Bag
FlavorText: State-of-the-art emergency medical gear.

Name: Rusty Pick
FlavorText: Itâ€™s dull, but it digs.

Name: Hardened Pick
FlavorText: Designed for deep-vein extraction.

Name: Multitool
FlavorText: A collection of wrenches, drivers, and pliers.

Name: Bent Wire
FlavorText: A desperate tool for a desperate thief.

Name: Lockpick Set
FlavorText: Professional tools for bypassing tumblers.

Name: Portable Lab
FlavorText: A compact set of vials and burners.

Name: Focus Beads
FlavorText: Smooth stones used to center the mind.

Name: Toxic Sludge
FlavorText: A vial of glowing green ooze.

Name: Void Dust
FlavorText: Black powder that absorbs light.

Name: Raw Meat
FlavorText: Tough and bloody. Best cooked first.

Name: Green Herb
FlavorText: Common medicinal plant found in the woods.

Name: Scholarly Text
FlavorText: A book on the dead languages of the coast.

Name: Neural Translator
FlavorText: An implant that decodes all speech in real-time.

Name: Strange Bone
FlavorText: It hums with a low frequency when held.

Name: Shadow Candle
FlavorText: The flame reveals what is hidden in the void.

Name: Void Grimoire
FlavorText: The pages bleed when you open them.

Name: Rusty Pliers
FlavorText: A crude way to extract information.

Name: The Rack
FlavorText: A portable version of the classic device.

Name: Neural Spike
FlavorText: Stimulates pain centers directly in the brain.

Name: Bribe Ledger
FlavorText: Names and prices of local officials.

Name: Guard Seal
FlavorText: A stolen badge of the Town Watch.

Name: Diplomat Decree
FlavorText: A high-level document signed by the Ruler.

Name: Standard Arrow
FlavorText: Simple wooden shaft with a flint head.

Name: Bodkin Arrow
FlavorText: Needle-like tip designed to slip through plates.

Name: Broadhead
FlavorText: Jagged edges that tear flesh upon entry.

Name: Iron Bolt
FlavorText: Heavy and reliable projectile for crossbows.

Name: Fire Bolt
FlavorText: Wrapped in oil-soaked rags. Bright and deadly.

Name: Heavy Lead Bolt
FlavorText: Weighted head designed to knock targets back.

Name: 9mm Round
FlavorText: Common handgun ammunition. Cheap and plentiful.

Name: .45 ACP Round
FlavorText: Heavy slug with high stopping power.

Name: Shotgun Slug
FlavorText: A solid lead block. Guaranteed to break bones.

Name: Hollow Point
FlavorText: Expands on impact. Causes massive internal trauma.

Name: AP Round
FlavorText: Tungsten core. Makes high-tier armor feel like paper.

Name: Loose Stone
FlavorText: A palm-sized rock. Good for throwing or sharpening.

Name: Broken Glass
FlavorText: Jagged shards. Could be useful for a trap or a shiv.

Name: Bent Pipe
FlavorText: A heavy lead pipe. Pure scrap metal.

Name: Rusty Nail
FlavorText: Corroded but sharp. Useful for improvised traps.

Name: Empty Bottle
FlavorText: A glass bottle. Makes a loud noise when broken.

Name: Red Brick
FlavorText: Solid and heavy. Can be used as a blunt projectile.

Name: Charred Paper
FlavorText: Burnt remains of a document. Some words are visible.

Name: Ragged Cloth
FlavorText: Dirty fabric. Can be cleaned or used for padding.

Name: Copper Wire
FlavorText: Valuable for electrical repairs.

Name: Old Boot
FlavorText: A sole-less leather boot. Truly worthless.
